name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AHelp: AI Writing, Homework and Research

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AHelp offers free AI writing tools and apps to improve your academic workflow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Correct your grammar, summarize or paraphrase any text, run plagiarism checks, and detect AI-generated content right in the browser tab. Use academia-specific features to easily find essay topics, generate citations, and grade your essay.

Write better and work faster no matter what you’re up to online with the free AHelp AI Writing Extension. Our AI writing assistant will handle it all: school papers, academic research, emails and professional correspondence, even social media captions. One place, no distractions.

🖊️ For perfected writing:
➡ Grammar Checker: correct any grammatical, spelling, and punctuation issues. Fix typos and receive stylistic suggestions to improve readability.
➡ Paraphraser: rewrite awkward sentences and achieve better clarity in your text with contextual paraphrasing that preserves your meaning.

🔍 For efficient research:
➡ Summary Generator: save time without missing key information by simplifying and quickly extracting insights from long papers.
➡ Cite Generator: create reputable bibliographies, in-text citations, and references from any source type in APA, MLA, and other styles.


🧑‍🎓 For academic excellence:
➡ Plagiarism Checker: prevent accidental copying with anti-cheating technology that detects hidden symbols, character replacements, and paraphrasing methods.
➡ AI Detector: scan your work for content from ChatGPT, GPT-4, Bard, Bing, Claude, Google-Gemini, LLaMa, and new AI models.
➡ AI Essay Grader: detect weak spots in your work and give it a final boost before submitting or save time on reviewing stacks of student papers.

⚙️ To start collaborating with our writing extension:

Download the AHelp AI Writing Extension from the Chrome Web Store and allow the browser to add it. Click on the puzzle symbol in the upper right corner, select your new writing buddy, and pick among the tools like Grammar Checker and AI Detector to start your journey together. Benefit from multiple features all in one convenient window.

Who can benefit from using AHelp AI Writing Extension?

🎓Students: set yourself up for the highest possible grade and make sure your essays are fail-proof with our Grammar Checker and Citation Generator.
👩🏻‍🏫Educators: give consistent feedback faster and preserve the academic integrity of your classroom with our AI Detector and Essay Grader.
🔬Researchers: stay up-to-date on the latest science with our Summary Generator and protect your research with our Plagiarism Checker.
📚Academic and creative writers: give old texts a second chance at life, avoid writer’s block, and jump-start your creativity with our Paraphraser.

AHelp AI Writing Extension offers you even more benefits:

✅ Multilingual: better writing in up to 9 languages, including English, Spanish, and Dutch.
✅ Support at every writing stage: find a topic, conduct research, write, check grammar, paraphrase essay, edit, check paper for plagiarism — we’ll be by your side the entire way. 
✅ Safe and secure: enjoy writing in privacy with your confidentiality preserved.
✅ Work where you please: use features like Summarizing Tool on any site you need it.
✅ Designed with academia in mind: created to fulfill students’ needs and backed by a scientific database.
✅ Free and easy: download at no cost and get immediate help with our intuitive interface.

💝Enjoy the free features of our extension!
➡ Reliable basic grammar check
➡ Accurate plagiarism and AI detection
➡ 2 paraphrasing modes including Fluency
➡ Short and bullet-point text summaries
➡ Upload your own files in popular formats
➡ General feedback on essays when grading

🌟Or visit our website to unlock the full potential!
➡ Advanced grammar check
➡ 5 additional paraphrasing modes, including Academic and Formal
➡ Medium and long paraphrasing options
➡ Detailed AI and plagiarism detection reports 
➡ Deep essay analysis including Topic Focus, Depth of Discussion, etc.
➡ AI Essay Checker and AI Essay Writer tools

Privacy and Data

Safeguarding your privacy is of utmost importance to AHelp. We have never sold your personal data to third parties, and we never will. We retain personal data only for as long as it is necessary or as mandated by law. We provide you with straightforward means to manage the sharing, public visibility, search engine indexing, and permanent deletion of information. Read our full Privacy Policy here: https://ahelp.com/privacy-policy/ or catch up on our Terms and Conditions here: https://ahelp.com/terms-and-conditions/.
